segments.text: Michael Johnson doesn ’ t look graceful , but he sure is powerful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I were on as many steroids as he was , I think I ’ d be powerful , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you talking about ? ! He ’ s passed every drug test he ’ s taken !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Those drug tests don ’ t mean anything ! He probably took some other drugs to mask the steroids .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just because Ben Johnson was juiced up doesn ’ t mean all athletes are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , OK . I ’ m feeling a little dehydrated . Let ’ s get something to drink .
segments.speaker: S2
